text: Esai Manuel Morales Jr. (born October 1, 1962) is an American actor. He played Bob Morales in the 1987 biopic La Bamba. He also appeared in the PBS drama American Family and in the Showtime series Resurrection Blvd. He is best known for his roles as Lt. Tony Rodriguez on NYPD Blue, Joseph Adama in the science fiction television series Caprica, and Camino del Rio in the Netflix original series Ozark. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Esai Morales
